device_mount: Mounted to wall; Roaming (e.g., on robot, robotic arm); Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room
use_cases_desc: Enabling content designers to create multi-display digital signages (movies, graphical content)
contribution_desc: A system for constructing arbitrary (non-grid) mobile multi-display arrangements. Devices are annexed by a synchronous pinching gesture across two devices, which also determines their relative positions.
tracking_characteristic: Location 2D; Tracking devices only; Inside-out tracking
